name: Male Unbonding Online Trivia | 'Seinfeld' - Season 1 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who is Kramer on the phone with in the beginning of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Joel.

	Jerry dislikes Joel, and because of this, Jerry likes to screen his calls.  Kramer made sure that Jerry didn't know he was talking to Joel.

questions.text: What did Joel have when he was a kid?
questions.explanation:
Ping pong table.

	Jerry used to live three doors down from Joel when they were kids and he used to play with Joel's ping pong table.  Now, Jerry can't stand Joel.

True.

	This name appears through many episodes in the series and is responsible for the coffee table book, the beach perfume, and many other useless inventions.

questions.text: Where does Jerry say he's going over the summer to see if Joel listens to him?
questions.explanation:
Iran.

	Jerry tells George that Joel has the attention span of a five-year-old, so he intentionally makes stuff up to see if Joel is listening.

questions.text: What sports team do Joel and Jerry see?
questions.explanation:
Knicks.

	Originally, Jerry had planned on seeing the Knicks game with George, but Jerry wanted to repay Joel for "breaking up" with him.

questions.text: Where does Jerry tell George about giving his ticket away?
questions.explanation:
The bank.

	Jerry tells George why his ticket was given away at the bank because George wants to cash in all of his change.  Unfortunately, George has too much change to cash in without rolling it.

questions.text: When Jerry makes up an excuse for Joel, what exam did he say he was going to help his nephew study for?
questions.explanation:
Geometry.

	Oddly, although Joel and Jerry have been lifelong friends, Joel didn't realize that Jerry doesn't have nephews or nieces because he has no siblings or a wife.

questions.text: What is not an excuse that Jerry makes up to avoid being with Joel?
questions.correct: He has a show in Boston
options: He has to pick someone up at the airport
He has to wait for the cable guy
questions.explanation:
He has a show in Boston.

	Jerry and Elaine make excuses, but Joel tries to set up a date where they can see one of the forty-one home games that the Knicks are playing.

questions.text: What kind of food is involved in Kramer's restaurant idea?
questions.explanation:
Pizza.

	Kramer wants to create a restaurant where the customers can create their own pizza pies.  Jerry doesn't think the idea will be successful.

questions.text: Elaine does not appear in this episode.
questions.explanation:
False.

	This is Elaine's first appearance on the show.  She appears only during the last five minutes, but becomes a major role through later episodes.
